Title: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
Plot: In the exciting series finale, a violent battle for control erupts on the submarine, which leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party ? one with an exploitative plan. Can Marcus and Sam take control of the sub before it?s too late?
GuestStars: Will Rothhaar, Jessica Camacho, Michael Mosley, David Rees Snell, Michael Gaston, Jason Beghe, Chin Han, Michael Ng
